root.name: Grease
root.description: 'Grease' is a game based on the film of the same name, and is being produced for both current Nintendo consoles. British publisher 505 Games are responsible for the production of this game. According to information from the press release, Grease is be a party game, where palyers are to be split into two different teams: The T-Birds, and the Pink Ladies. These two groups were the main cliques in the 1978 film that the game shares its name with.
